#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define sz 100002
#define pb(a) push_back(a)
#define ll long long
#define ull unsigned long long
#define fread freopen("input.txt","r",stdin)
#define fwrite freopen("output.txt","w",stdout)
#define inf (1<<29)
#define mem(abc,z) memset(abc,z,sizeof(abc))
#define PI acos(-1)

int main(){
   int t,n,a,ans;
   vector<int>v;
   cin>>t;
   while(t--){
     v.clear();
     cin>>n;
     for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
        cin>>a;
        v.push_back(a);
     }
     ans = 0;
     for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
        int st = i;
        while(i+1<n && v[i+1]==v[st]){
            i++;
        }
        ans = max(ans,i-st);
     }
     cout<<ans<<endl;
   }
   return 0;
}
